name: Scaladar
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
book: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

traits.Lightning Absorption: Whenever the scaladar is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage, and its sting deals an extra 11 (2d10) lightning damage until the end of its next turn.
traits.Scaladar Link: The scaladar knows the location of other scaladar within 100 feet of it, and it can sense when any of them take damage.
